import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import ContactForm from'./components/ContactForm';import ContactList from'./components/ContactList';import'./styles/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[contacts,setContacts]=useState([]);// Fetch contacts when the component mounts
useEffect(()=>{fetchContacts();},[]);// GET request to retrieve contacts
const fetchContacts=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:5001/api/contacts');// Adjust to the backend server URL
setContacts(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching contacts:',error);}};// Adding a new contact and updating state
const addContact=newContact=>{setContacts([...contacts,newContact]);};// Deleting a contact and updating state
const deleteContact=id=>{setContacts(contacts.filter(contact=>contact._id!==id));};// Updating an existing contact and state
const updateContact=(id,updatedContact)=>{setContacts(contacts.map(contact=>contact._id===id?updatedContact:contact));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDCC7 Phone Book"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactForm,{addContact:addContact}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactList,{contacts:contacts,deleteContact:deleteContact,updateContact:updateContact})]});}export default App;
